description: Webapp manifest used for building dynamic, component-driven webapps.

version.description: Version of the manifest parsing engine.

class.description: Optional `class` attribute. Useful for styling custom CSS.

config.description: Configuration parameters passed on to the component.

visibility_condition.description: JsonLogic for calculating if the component is visible or not.

click_screen.description: Screen to navigate user to when item is clicked

completion_screens.description: Screen/s that marks this item as completed

address_enter_manually.description: Enter Manually Address link content key.

toggle_address_enter_manually_true.description: Enter Manually Address link content key for toggling `true` state.

toggle_address_enter_manually_false.description: Enter Manually Address link content key for toggling `false` state.

initial_screen.description: First screen path or JsonLogic for calculating first screen.

currency_template.description:
Price formatting template.
See docs for more detailed explanation.

overwrite_values.description:
Overwrite `input` state values.

Values here will always be applied to input state no matter what.

computed_values.description:
Computes values and applies them into input state.

When `update_when_changes` is defined, framework will wait for any of those
values to change before applying updates to input.

flow_finish_events.description: Events that are marked as finished.

version.description: API version that should be used. Defaults to v1.

field_definition.description:
Additional field definitions that should be added. These are frontend
specific. They do NOT affect backend validation. Usually they are used to
set "optin" validation as these fields are not required to be sent to BE.

transformer.description:
Transformer should be added when there's data that needs to be transformed
before sending it to BE.

path.description: Path to the field (i.e. `""` for root-level or `"data"` for data level).

validation.description: Validation rules applied to this field.

editable.description:
For MTA patch field definition it is possible to define if the field is
editable or not.

This can also be JsonLogic, but that works only in FE as BE is NOT willing
to implement this or alternative feature as always! :)

JsonLogic is used to make fields disabled for editing based on existing data.

path.description: Path to the field (i.e. `""` for root-level or `"data"` for data level).

send_to_api.description: Should the value be sent to BE or not (Default is `true`).

insurer_name.description:
Content key for insurer name. Used in Paypal modal as back button (i.e.
"Back to {insurer Name}"). Defaults to Paypal account name if not set.

default.description:
Default layout definition used for all screens that don't have a specific
`layout` defined.

components.description:
Components used in the layout.

Use `{ "type": "flow" }` in places where the flow must be added.

layout.description: Name of a layout that's used for this screen.

show_back_button.description: Show/hide back button on this screen.

required_requests.description:
Request/s required to be performed before opening this screen. If one or
many of the provided requests is not complete, the application will throw
and log an exception.

flow_complete.description:
Set a particular screen as a finishing line for the flow.

When user reaches screen where this is set to `true`, all fields in the
flow will be disabled. So whenever user tries to go back to edit some fields
it would not be possible.

components.description: Full screen definition of the components that are used here.

next.description:
Logic for deciding what screen to open when clicking "next" in the flow.
Can be either a `string` for a specific screen or JsonLogic for conditional
next screen.

ApiManifestFlowRequiredRequest.description:
`string` name of the required requests that must have been done in the given
screen or JsonLogic calculating the required requests.

anyOf.description: Should there only be one open accordion panel at a time
Content gets shown and hidden thru animation

KaskoAccordionPanelComponent.title: KaskoAccordionPanelComponent
KaskoAccordionPanelComponent.description: A panel that shows/hides content when user clicks on header.

KaskoButtonSideMenuComponent.title: KaskoButtonSideMenuComponent
KaskoButtonSideMenuComponent.description: Component should be paired with `sidebar` component in layout as clicking this button, reveals side menu.

anyOf.description: On which side button should be aligned

KaskoContainerComponent.title: KaskoContainerComponent
KaskoContainerComponent.description: A simple div/container component. Good for wrapping components and then styling adding css class to it.

KaskoHeaderComponent.title: KaskoHeaderComponent
KaskoHeaderComponent.description: Header component most commonly used in layout definitions.

components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's body

KaskoFooterComponent.title: KaskoFooterComponent
KaskoFooterComponent.description: Footer component most commonly used in layout definitions. Used for building the footer element with it's links.

KaskoFormComponent.title: KaskoFormComponent
KaskoFormComponent.description: `<form>` elements' component used as a wrapper around other form elements.By itself this component has no visual representation. It's purely structural.

anyOf.description: Should the form watch for each input change & trigger requests each time something changes? This is useful if we need to trigger a new quote request each time a radio/checkbox changes
How wide should the form be? `wide` for full width, but `default` for limited width
Should the validation happen as the customer is typing, or after "submit" is clicked?
All form fields are disabled when quote/policy/payment request is running. If set to `true`, the fields will not be disabled
Should we allow submitting the form even if there are errors? By default we don\'t allow submitting form with validation errors
Enables mode that reverts user input to what it was before data was changed in current screen when navigation happens without the press of "next" button (e.g. link click, back button click)

KaskoGridComponent.title: KaskoGridComponent
KaskoGridComponent.description: A component used to build grid row based on bootstraps' grid. It's a container of `GridItem` objects which has `class` property - bootstraps' column CSS Class e.g. `col-sm-8` and `components` property - array of other components.

anyOf.description: An array containing `GridItem` objects with `class` and `components` properties

KaskoGridInlineComponent.title: KaskoGridInlineComponent
KaskoGridInlineComponent.description:
A component that treats each child component as an inline text. Great for
placing links, text, icons or images next to each other.

KaskoErrorListComponent.title: KaskoErrorListComponent
KaskoErrorListComponent.description: Displays a list of error messages.

anyOf.description: Doesn't show error messages for specified fields
Shows error messages only for specified fields
Hides errors that produce the same translation

KaskoInfoMarkdownComponent.title: KaskoInfoMarkdownComponent
KaskoInfoMarkdownComponent.description: Info screens (FAQ, terms & conditions etc.) need a slightly different format. This component is used for those screens.

KaskoDatasetMapComponent.title: KaskoDatasetMapComponent
KaskoDatasetMapComponent.description: Component that has no display, but wherever it's rendered it automatically maps values from dataset (that is if dataset is prefilled).

field_map.description:
Data field mapping for extra values
`left` - input state field name
`right` - dataset field name

anyOf.description: Prevents paste action into input field
Mask for displaying the phone number after the country code
Set the value to true to enable `default_mask`

KaskoFormInputSignatureComponent.title: KaskoFormInputSignatureComponent
KaskoFormInputSignatureComponent.description: Canvas element for drawing signature and uploading it to media service.

KaskoFormInputButtonComponent.title: KaskoFormInputButtonComponent
KaskoFormInputButtonComponent.description: A input button element used in the form that submits the customers input on click. Useful for yes/no questions.

anyOf.description: Set id property for button element in DOM
Two types of button - update only input state with type `"button"`; update input state and submit form with type `"submit"`

KaskoFormInputMonetaryComponent.title: KaskoFormInputMonetaryComponent
KaskoFormInputMonetaryComponent.description: Form input used for monetary inputs. If the customer types in "1", then it translates to "100". Also it sets two input variables on the state: `${field_name}` and `${field_name}_human` - first containing price in cents but the later containing the user friendly value (original input).

anyOf.description: Sets thousand separator for input field (it doesn't affect value in state)
Sets decimal separator for input field (it doesn't affect value in state)
Input elements' value when it's selected

components.description: Children component definitions added to the right side of the input element. This is used for icons and small labels

KaskoFormItemDropdownComponent.title: KaskoFormItemDropdownComponent
KaskoFormItemDropdownComponent.description: Constructs a form dropdown element which consists of touchpoint item list. Saves the item id in value - `item_id` and title in `field_name`. Useful for screens prior to item selection.

anyOf.description: Field that will save item title
List of item id's that should not be shown
List of item id's that should be shown but not selectable

KaskoFormItemRadioSelectComponent.title: KaskoFormItemRadioSelectComponent
KaskoFormItemRadioSelectComponent.description: A list of form item radio selection boxes. Useful for screens prior to item selection.

anyOf.description: Field that will save item title
List of item id's that should not be shown
List of item id's that should be shown but not selectable

KaskoFormRepeaterComponent.title: KaskoFormRepeaterComponent
KaskoFormRepeaterComponent.description: Form Repeater component is analog of loops from programming languages.

anyOf.description: Name of the selected index field

fixed_length.description: Fixed number of repeated component definitions

fixed_length_defaults.description: Default object value for creating fixed length items

KaskoFormRepeaterAddComponent.title: KaskoFormRepeaterAddComponent
KaskoFormRepeaterAddComponent.description: Form Repeater add component is meant to work hand in hand with `form-repeater` component. It is a button that pushes new data to array field.

anyOf.description: Name of the selected index field which is used in base `form-repeater` component

defaults.description: Data that will be added to array when button is clicked

KaskoFormRepeaterRemoveComponent.title: KaskoFormRepeaterRemoveComponent
KaskoFormRepeaterRemoveComponent.description: Form Repeater Remove component is meant to work hand in hand with `form-repeater` component and must be placed inside `form-repeater` components. It is a button that removes data from array field by index.

anyOf.description: _Automatically generated from parent repeater component, e.g. `items.0`_

KaskoFormRepeaterSelectComponent.title: KaskoFormRepeaterSelectComponent
KaskoFormRepeaterSelectComponent.description: Form Repeater select component is meant to work hand in hand with `form-repeater` component. It is a button that selects item to show in repeater component.

anyOf.description: Name of the repeater array field
Direction that user should be sent

KaskoFormButtonNextComponent.title: KaskoFormButtonNextComponent
KaskoFormButtonNextComponent.description: `next` button used in the form that submits the customers input and proceeds to the next screen.

anyOf.description: Two types of button - update only input state with type `"button"`; update input state and submit form with type `"submit"`

KaskoFormButtonPaymentComponent.title: KaskoFormButtonPaymentComponent
KaskoFormButtonPaymentComponent.description: `payment` button used in the form that performs payment request.

KaskoFormCouponCodeComponent.title: KaskoFormCouponCodeComponent
KaskoFormCouponCodeComponent.description: A component for displaying the coupon code field and the button to apply the coupon code.

KaskoFormPanelComponent.title: KaskoFormPanelComponent
KaskoFormPanelComponent.description: A simple panel with body, header and footer. This component is not meant to be used as a standalone thing. It is a wrapper around other components.

header_components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's header

components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's body

footer_components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's footer

KaskoPriceComponent.title: KaskoPriceComponent
KaskoPriceComponent.description: Displays the price to the customer.

anyOf.description: If price should be retrieved from `extra_data`, then key can be set as this parameter.

KaskoInlinePriceTagComponent.title: KaskoInlinePriceTagComponent
KaskoInlinePriceTagComponent.description: A component to display `grossPremium` value from quote request with customized `input` data.

input.description: Input fields with data to replace in request

KaskoPriceTagComponent.title: KaskoPriceTagComponent
KaskoPriceTagComponent.description: Displays a nicely formatted price tag. Usually at the bottom of the screen. In this component is available to use `QuoteState` and `InputState` data.

anyOf.description: Location of the discounted price. Before or after the actual price the customer will have to pay. \`hidden\` for not showing it at all

KaskoFormPaymentComponent.title: KaskoFormPaymentComponent
KaskoFormPaymentComponent.description: A component for displaying stripe credit card, stripe SEPA and paypal integrations.

anyOf.description: Display format for date in input field
Set min view mode of datepicker

KaskoFormDateTimepickerComponent.title: KaskoFormDateTimepickerComponent
KaskoFormDateTimepickerComponent.description: A form date and time picker component.

anyOf.description: Display format for date in input field
Icon shown besides the field. All font-awesome icons are available

KaskoFormDataLookupComponent.title: KaskoFormDataLookupComponent
KaskoFormDataLookupComponent.description: Input with dropdown search that fetches data from Kasko Data Service

anyOf.description: Data field name to search for
Data field template for displaying data in dropdown list
Field name of source field where in_dataset is defined
Minimal wait time after last character typed before typeahead kicks-in
Minimal no of characters that needs to be entered
How many items to show in dropdown
Shows data list dropdown on input focus event

field_map.description: Data field mapping for extra values

anyOf.description: Field name list of fields to be cleared when current field value changes
Sort returned dataset by `data_field_name` column in ascending or descending order

KaskoFormDataInputComponent.title: KaskoFormDataInputComponent
KaskoFormDataInputComponent.description: Input that matches value to data from Data Service and fetches the first result.

anyOf.description: Data field name to search for
Minimal wait time after last character typed before typeahead kicks-in
Minimal no of characters that needs to be entered
Used when data in Data Service are private (not shown in FE)

field_map.description: Data field mapping for extra values

anyOf.description: Field name list of fields to be cleared when current field value changes
Sort returned dataset by `data_field_name` column in ascending or descending order

KaskoFormDataTypeaheadComponent.title: KaskoFormDataTypeaheadComponent
KaskoFormDataTypeaheadComponent.description: Input with dropdown search that retrieves data from `customData` state.

anyOf.description: Data field name to search for
Data field template for displaying data in dropdown list
How many items to show in dropdown
Minimal wait time after last character typed before typeahead kicks-in
Minimal no of characters that needs to be entered
Shows data list dropdown on input focus event

field_map.description: Data field mapping for extra values

anyOf.description: Filters typeahead dropdown options while typing input (used in case where data is retrieved only once)

KaskoFormInputOptinComponent.title: KaskoFormInputOptinComponent
KaskoFormInputOptinComponent.description: A form input optin radio/checkbox element that's contained within a panel. Only difference from `form-input-select-horizontal` is that in this components' `content_key` can use links to dynamic item assets.

anyOf.description: Input elements' value when it's selected

header_components.description: Children component definitions added on top of the input element

components.description: Children component definitions added to the right side of the input element. This is used for icons and small labels

KaskoFormInputSelectHorizontalComponent.title: KaskoFormInputSelectHorizontalComponent
KaskoFormInputSelectHorizontalComponent.description: A form input optin radio/checkbox element that's contained within a panel.

anyOf.description: Input elements' value when it's selected

components.description: Children component definitions added to the right side of the input element. This is used for icons and small labels

KaskoFormInputSelectVerticalComponent.title: KaskoFormInputSelectVerticalComponent
KaskoFormInputSelectVerticalComponent.description: A form `input` radio/checkbox element that's contained within a vertical panel.

anyOf.description: Input elements' value when it's selected
Array of classes. If this component contains an element with one of specified classes in this array, a selection won't be triggered.

components.description: Children component definitions added above input checkbox/radio

anyOf.description: Set allowed extensions for upload. By default allowed all extensions.

content_key.description: Content key for each subscription plan

KaskoImageComponent.title: KaskoImageComponent
KaskoImageComponent.description: Displays an image with static variables.

anyOf.description: A `href` attribute of `a` tag. The Image will be wrapped in this tag if `href` is defined.

KaskoContentImageComponent.title: KaskoContentImageComponent
KaskoContentImageComponent.description: Displays an image with dynamic variables from contents.

KaskoSidebarComponent.description: Sidebar component most commonly used in layout definitions. Used for building the sidebar element with it's links.

KaskoSummaryPanelComponent.description: A panel showing the summary screen values & edit buttons (optional).

components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's body

header_components.description: Used to replace regular pencil icon with any other component

anyOf.description: Used to enable/disable editing flag change upon component render

KaskoSummaryPanelRowComponent.title: KaskoSummaryPanelRowComponent
KaskoSummaryPanelRowComponent.description:
A single summary panel row with label, value and optionally edit button (if `input_field` is defined).

*Note: without being wrapped in `summary-panel` this component has essentially no styling.*

anyOf.description: Field name used for finding the screen to which the "edit" button should lead to

components.description: Children component definitions added to the panel's body

footer_components.description: Used to replace regular pencil icon with any other component

anyOf.description: Used to enable/disable editing flag change upon component render

KaskoTextPositionComponent.title: KaskoTextPositionComponent
KaskoTextPositionComponent.description: Wrapper component for changing position of text.

anyOf.description: Position of the children's text content

KaskoButtonBackComponent.title: KaskoButtonBackComponent
KaskoButtonBackComponent.description: A button that dispatches the `Back` action.

anyOf.description: Is this button disabled or not

KaskoButtonExternalLinkComponent.title: KaskoButtonExternalLinkComponent
KaskoButtonExternalLinkComponent.description: A button that opens up an external link once clicked.

anyOf.description: Specifies the target how the link should be opened. If embedded within iframe, then this does nothing
Is this button disabled or not

KaskoButtonExternalLinkContentComponent.title: KaskoButtonExternalLinkContentComponent
KaskoButtonExternalLinkContentComponent.description: A button that opens up an external link once clicked. Contract to `button-external-link` this component uses `link_key`. In this way this component gives chance to use external values which are passed to webapp in snippet or as URL parameters.

anyOf.description: Content key which SHOULD contain a link
Specifies the target how the link should be opened. If embedded within iframe, then this does nothing
Is this button disabled or not

KaskoButtonResetFlowComponent.title: KaskoButtonResetFlowComponent
KaskoButtonResetFlowComponent.description: A button that resets flow and brings user to initial starting screen with option to pre-fill `InputState`.

anyOf.description: Reload webapp with prefilled `config` & `data` entries in `queryString`
Is this button disabled or not

KaskoBackAngleComponent.title: KaskoBackAngleComponent
KaskoBackAngleComponent.description: A "back" angle usually displayed at top of the page. This component is usually paired together with `visibility_condition` to have it show/hidden on certain screens.

steps.description: Step definition of the progress bar.

anyOf.description: To show or to hide percentage for progress bar.
An array with specified steps of the user flow.

If `true`, when the user clicks on any previous completed step, the active step will be the clicked one.
If you enable this option, you must specify `section_screens` array in each item of `items` prop.
If `false`, the step that is not completed yet will always remain an active even when the user
clicks on the previous completed steps.

If `true`, hides progress indicator icons on the left side.
If `false`, displays progress indicator icons on the left side.

KaskoStatusComponent.title: KaskoStatusComponent
KaskoStatusComponent.description: Status page component. Useful for success/error pages.

anyOf.description: Content key. The text that will be displayed under the icon.

KaskoSaveForLaterButtonComponent.title: KaskoSaveForLaterButtonComponent
KaskoSaveForLaterButtonComponent.description: Button used for triggering request for "save-for-later" functionality.

anyOf.description: Two types of button - update only input state with type `"button"`; update input state and submit form with type `"submit"`
Is this button disabled or not
Validate input fields on screen before triggering save for later request
Navigate to next screen on successful `save for later` request.
Navigate to next screen on successful `save for later` request.

KaskoSaveQuoteButtonComponent.title: KaskoSaveQuoteButtonComponent
KaskoSaveQuoteButtonComponent.description: Button used for triggering a LEAD request for "save-quote-for-later" functionality.

anyOf.description: Is this button disabled or not
Defines if need to go to next screen on successful `lead` request.

KaskoStripe3dSecureButtonComponent.title: KaskoStripe3dSecureButtonComponent
KaskoStripe3dSecureButtonComponent.description:
Button used to trigger recurring payment's authentication flow.

This button is used in standalone flow for webapps and this flow can be opened only by link from recurring payment's email.
When open this standalone flow, there should always be `payment_id` set in `QueryString.config` data.
Also `cc_number` should be added to `fields` array, it will catch all errors related with payments.

anyOf.description: Is this button disabled or not

KaskoPolicyUpdateButtonComponent.title: KaskoPolicyUpdateButtonComponent
KaskoPolicyUpdateButtonComponent.description: Button used for updating policy data.

anyOf.description: Is this button disabled or not
Go to next screen if policy is updated

KaskoPollDocumentsComponent.title: KaskoPollDocumentsComponent
KaskoPollDocumentsComponent.description:
Component that has no display, but wherever it's rendered it automatically starts polling.

Documents can be accessed in jsonlogic or content strings using `document` namespace.

### Example accessing document in markdown content
```csv
"flow.key","Here is offer document: [{document.lead.offer.name}]({document.lead.offer.url})"
```

anyOf.description: Type of request to get docs from
Creates new lead on components initialization
Polls new document after set time interval (milliseconds)

KaskoOfferUpdateButtonComponent.title: KaskoOfferUpdateButtonComponent
KaskoOfferUpdateButtonComponent.description: Button used for updating offer data.

anyOf.description: Is this button disabled or not
Go to next screen if offer is updated

KaskoIconComponent.title: KaskoIconComponent
KaskoIconComponent.description: Display either a font-awesome icon or a SVG icon.

anyOf.description: Content of the icon. Class name if type is `fa` or SVG content if `svg` type.
Content of the icon. Class name if type is `fa` or SVG content if `svg` type.
Name of a screen or external link.
Content key of the title of the link.
If you go to other screen, before leaving, it will save current form snapshot

KaskoContentLinkComponent.title: KaskoContentLinkComponent
KaskoContentLinkComponent.description:
Adds a simple <a href> to another screen within the flow or to an external URL (opens in new tab) -
the URL is loaded from content strings rather that hardcoded in the manifest.
This is especially useful if we have a multi-language application with different links in each language.

KaskoGoogleMapsAddressComponent.title: KaskoGoogleMapsAddressComponent
KaskoGoogleMapsAddressComponent.description: Google Maps integration for address selection.

keys.description: The keys from google maps API.

anyOf.description: Indicates whether google maps card should be hidden. If yes, only autocomplete input is shown.

field_mapping.description: Field mapping configuration for Google Api return values.

anyOf.description: Flag name to be dispatched on manual address selection.

restrictions.description: Flag name to be dispatched on manual address selection.

anyOf.description: Defines if need to go to next screen on `enter address manually` click, if it's `false`, then it's just toggling `manual_address` flag.
A ratio between the height and the width of the map. Max value is 1.

KaskoGoogleMapsPredictionsComponent.title: KaskoGoogleMapsPredictionsComponent
KaskoGoogleMapsPredictionsComponent.description: Google Maps integration for address selection.

keys.description: The keys from google maps API.

field_mapping.description: Field mapping configuration for Google Api return values.

restrictions.description: Restrictions for countries where search is allowed

KaskoModuleGridComponent.title: KaskoModuleGridComponent
KaskoModuleGridComponent.description:
A grid showing products in columns, that can be hidden conditionally.

By default `focus_condition` will recursively look for components that contains `field_name` and `field_value`.
If value from input matches value from config `focus_condition` for column will be set to `true`.

Later `true` focus condition always wins between columns (so if multiple column focus condition is set to true, last one will be focused).

**Note:** `focus_condition` will not do anything for column that is set as header with `is_header` flag as it'll be hidden in mobile view.

anyOf.description: Children component definitions added to the columns's body

KaskoModuleGridRowComponent.title: KaskoModuleGridRowComponent
KaskoModuleGridRowComponent.description: Container component designed to work hand in hand with `module-grid` component.

components.description: Children component definitions added to the row's body

header_components.description: Children component definitions added to the top of row's body. These components will be shown only on small screens

anyOf.description: Should border be shown on top of this row
Should border be shown on bottom of this row

KaskoFormInputNumericComponent.title: KaskoFormInputNumericComponent
KaskoFormInputNumericComponent.description: Form input used for numeric inputs that have thousand and decimal seperators.

anyOf.description: Sets thousand separator for input field (it doesn't affect value in state)
